intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Say, Lucina? I'm still around in your future, right?

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: Well... You're warm and kind, for starters. Even amid the darkness and desolation. Your smile serves as a beacon of hope for all those around you.

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Oh geez! I'd better get cracking if I want to live up to that. Oh! I know! Do I have any children?

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: You have a son named Owain.

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Aw cute! What's he like?

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: He's... Well, he's quite colorful.

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Hmm... I'm not sure I want to know what that means. Oh wait! One more thing! Does he have...

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: Yes?

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: No... Never mind.

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: Are you sure?

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Sorry, I just remembered I promised to help Chrom with something. ...Bye!

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: Lissa?

intro.speaker: Ruffian
intro.line: This is it boss! That treasure's here; I'm sure of it!

intro.speaker: Gecko
intro.line: All right, woman. Speak! Where'd you put it?

intro.speaker: Maiden
intro.line: I've never heard of no treasure here! Honest I haven't!

intro.speaker: Gecko
intro.line: Oh? Then I guess we're done here. She's useless, boys. Kill her.

intro.speaker: Ruffian
intro.line: Aye, boss!
Halt, fiends!

intro.speaker: Ruffian
intro.line: The devil are you?!
One chosen by forces beyond mortal comprehension! See how my sword hand twitches! It hungers... for justice! Leave now if you value life and limb, for I cannot stay the hungry hand!

intro.speaker: Ruffian
intro.line: This guy's got rocks in his head... All right then boy. Guess you're the first to—— Gragh!
I tried to warn you, foul villain. The hand cannot be denied!

intro.speaker: Maiden
intro.line: Oh thank the stars! You saved my life!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Wait. That stance...

intro.speaker: Gecko
intro.line: Rgh... Who ARE you?!
I am the wolf who howls for justice! The eagle who cries for love!

intro.speaker: Owain
intro.line: A chosen warrior come from the future to bring hope for a dying world... I am Owain! Now, atone for your deeds in the eternal hellfire of perdition! RADIANT...DAAAAAAWN! ..... Blast you, sword hand! Now's no time for games! You've escaped fate this time, rogue, but remember——justice always prevails!

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Wow, that guy's really weird. ...Wait a second.

intro.speaker: Gecko
intro.line: Gahar har har! I KNEW there were rocks in your head! Look lively, boys! Ignore the dolt and find us that treasure! Pinch everything that shines, and make for the hills!

intro.speaker: Owain
intro.line: Not today, ne'er-do-wells! The legendary blade Mystletainn is fated for my twitching hand alone!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: ...I am so lost right now. What is he even talking about? ...Never mind. Let's just kill the bandits, and I'm sure everything will sort itself out.

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Nrgh! Sword hand, no! Control yourself! P-power... too great... C-can't contain it...

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Um, sorry to interrupt your... conversation? But I have a question about your stance. You've crafted your own style around it, but it's clearly from the royal house of Ylisse.

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: By the gods old and new! Another future traveler?! And yet, impossible, for I saw none like him in the light... Who are you, villain?! Speak now!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Um, I'm Chrom. ...Of Ylisse? I have no quarrel with you, but if we must fight, then-

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: UNCLE CHROM?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: ...Uncle?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Wait! Hold on! Let me start over. O fellow scion of the great hero, I greet you as kin and kind! From across the misty shores of time I strive, bearing forth tidings of-

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Keep it brief, would you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: ...I'm Lissa's kid from the future!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: That is... not what I was expecting to hear. Did you come with Lucina?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Yes. It seems the blood we share has drawn us like moths to the flame! Like a great tidal wave of heroism, we crash upon the shores of evil and-

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Can you fight? Or do you just talk a lot?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: My mettle in combat is the stuff of legend! Bards sing tales of my- H-hey! Wait! Uncle Chrooom! I have but one request. If you find the sword Mystletainn, please permit me to wield it!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: I heard you wailing about that before. What kind of blade are we talking here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: A legendary one, Uncle! Imbued with the very power of the gods, if the tales are to be believed. I would use its might to defend my sacred queen and mother!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: ...You mean Lissa? *Sigh* I suppose I should just be happy she has such a... devoted son.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lissa
recruit-talk.line: Oh, hey! It's you. Thanks for helping-

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: MOM?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Lissa
recruit-talk.line: Hu-what?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Blessed Mother! I have crossed oceans of time to find- Oh, forget it. I'm your kid from the future! Look at the signet ring upon my finger. Behold, a perfect match to yours! Unique in all the world, and yet here lie two. Proof positive my claims are true!

recruit-talk.speaker: Lissa
recruit-talk.line: ... Who did what now? Hold on. Slow down. Back up. Start again.

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Um... Sorry about that. Look, the important thing here is that I'm-

recruit-talk.speaker: Lissa
recruit-talk.line: ...Oh, gods. Owain.

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Huh?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lissa
recruit-talk.line: That's your name. Isn't it?

recruit-talk.speaker: Owain
recruit-talk.line: Indeed it is! And none have ever been prouder to bear it! For it is the name you gave me, Mother! I've come to part the dark clouds that hang forebodingly over this era!

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Hail, traveler. Thank you for coming to our aid. Please use this to treat your injured. It's an old recipe, but well effective.

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: You're a welcome sight indeed. I'd near given up hope! This is one of our village treasures. May it help you in keeping us safe.

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: You have our thanks for your bravery. I'm afraid this medicine is all I can offer in return, but I pray it keeps you safe.

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: You're a kind soul to fight for strangers so. Here, you must take this.

visit.speaker: Owain
visit.line: By the ghost of Ike! I've found it at last! The fated mate of my sword hand! ...The divine blade, Mystletainn!

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Er, I'm afraid this is a blade of extremely common make, sir. I was using it to dig a well, but I figured you might--

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: I also used it to cut small vegetables before it got dull. ...Er, hello?

visit.speaker: Owain
visit.line: The blade of legend and song... I feel its power coursing through me! At last, my sword hand lays calm. Come, Mystletainn. Destiny beckons! The rest of these rogues are ours alone!

boss.speaker: Gecko
boss.line: This treasure's mine! Cross me, and I'll decorate this place with your bones!

end.speaker: Villager
end.line: We owe you a great debt for protecting our village. Truly, from all of us, thank you.

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Where did he get off to? Lucina said she saw him go this way. ..... Ugh, maybe I should just forget it. If he doesn't have one, either.....  Aaah!

end.speaker: Ruffian
end.line: Keh heh! Let's have all your coin girly! Unless you wanna lose that pretty head.

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Stay back!

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: No one hurts the mother of Owain! SACRED...STOOOOOONES!

end.speaker: Ruffian
end.line: Guhaaargh!

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: Mother, are you all right?!

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm... Holy crow! Your arm!

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: This? Hah! It's nothing but a torn sleeve.

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: ...No, I mean, HOLY CROW! LOOK AT THAT THING ON YOUR ARM!

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: Oh right! Sorry. Guess I should have shown you before. It's my Brand. The one carried by House Ylisse. So no more need to worry, eh?

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Th-then you know? That I don't...

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: That your Brand never surfaced? Yes, you told me as much. You said it always weighed on you... You should have seen how happy you were the day mine appeared! You were sobbing and laughing for an hour without pause!

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: I was kind of hoping to grow out of the crying thing...

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: Yes, well. No more worrying. It was by chance alone that your Brand never surfaced. We're all family, linked by blood. You really are Chrom's sister. My Brand proves our lineage.

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Thank you. Just... *sniff* Thank you, Owain.

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: You're welcome!

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: Heh... *sniff*

end.speaker: Owain
end.line: And as scions of the hero, it falls on us to ensure my dark future doesn't come true. Come, Mother! We shall fight together! Uh-oh... Argh... Too much...passion! Sword hand...getting hungry...again!

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: You know, maybe you should have that looked at.
